nodestrum stylus mixins
=========

size
----
```css
div { size: 10px }
section { size: 100px 50px; }
```
compiles to:
```css
div {
  width: 10px;
  height: 10px;
}
section {
  width: 100px;
  height: 50px;
}
```

fon
-----
```css
div {
    fon: 12px 15px normal black left;
}
```
compiles to:
```css
div {
  font-size: 12px;
  line-height: 15px;
  font-weight: normal;
  color: #000;
  text-align: left;
}
```
